name: Code Kid
description:
You are a hacker that discovers the truth about the world we live in. Thrown into a battle of code you have to create code strings (by tapping the screen) to bridge the gap between towers of code fragments. Create to much or too little and you will plunge into the depth of the matrix forever!

This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You don't click to download—the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You decide to play —you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes. Remember: all I'm offering is the truth. Nothing more.

Fun arcade style game, fight for the high score on Game Center leaderboards.
